name: Adithya93.GitHub.io
tagline: Personal Website with easy access to projects
body:
### Nerd Alert.
I am Adi. I like software, hardware, running and cycling. 

### Summary
* Electrical & Computer Engineering and Computer Science at Duke University (Class of '18)
* Favorite software stack : MEAN (Except that I prefer REDIS to Mongo and barely know any Angular 2)
* Vegetarian
* Coffee Addict

### Projects
* **[Ulysses](https://github.com/chronologos/ulysses-js)** A web app for people to make Ulysses Contracts with others. Built on Django and MongoDB with [Ian Tay](https://chronologos.github.io/) (In Progress)

* **[OpenWebChat](https://github.com/Adithya93/webchatapp)** A strictly inferior, web-only version of popular chat apps, made just for the fun of it with NodeJS, Socket.io, Express and REDIS Server (In Progress)

* **[Galaga](https://github.com/Adithya93/DE2Board2DShooter)** : 2D shooting game built on own 5-stage pipelined processor with Verilog & MIPS Assembly [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MDhBFvzRx3A)

* **[Ascent Debate](http://www.ascentdebate.com/)** Web portal for online debate tutoring - laid out initial back-end groundwork, now handed over to professional developer

* **[Foodpoints+](https://github.com/chronologos/duke_foodpoints)** Web app for Duke Students to track their food spending. Built with [Ian Tay](https://github.com/chronologos) using Node.js, MongoDB, Angular.js. Has reached 250 monthly active users.

### Fun stuff I'm trying to learn about
* Distributed Systems
* Embedded Systems
* Machine Learning

### Random
![Ruby Beach, Olympic National Park, Washington](https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Favatars0.githubusercontent.com%2Fu%2F9772713%3Fv%3D3%26s%3D460&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FAdithya93&docid=lYCjcgcE7wvf_M&tbnid=yOxyYcTgSmw1AM%3A&w=460&h=460&itg=1&bih=705&biw=1280&ved=0ahUKEwinjafUqYHOAhVJ2IMKHSqaDc8QMwgrKA0wDQ&iact=mrc&uact=8)

### Contact
